comment._content: The 6th man from the left (beard) is James J. Hill President of Great Northern Railway who died in 1916, and the building looks like the Saint Paul Minnesota Union Depot

comment._content: I like this photo, I only wish the signature were somewhere else less visible.

comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: Interesting example of a preserved (and restored) machine in the early 20th century: a wood-burning 1861 steam locomotive, ca. 1915.
